name: Emperors Sword
author: Immuseong
content: Zhu Yunwen, who barely survived the Jingnan campaign, received the souls of two of the world&#039s strongest martial artists, the First Heavenly Demon of the Demonic Cult and Huineng, the Sixth Patriarch of the Shaolin Temple, in his body, and was reborn as Heaven Destroyer.This is the story of the Heaven Destroyer&#039s journey to become an absolute existence!
